body_html: A similar bug has been discussed here. keras-team/keras#8416 . However, I still not see why it is not recommended since tf.keras is a part of tensorflow now. I still think it is important to have variable_scope for Keras Layer, instead of avoiding using it.

body: A similar bug has been discussed here.  https://github.com/keras-team/keras/issues/8416 . However, I still not see why it is not recommended since `tf.keras` is a part of tensorflow now. I  still think it is important to have `variable_scope` for Keras Layer, instead of avoiding using it.
